item.title: Women and conferences
item.description: I used to not understand the fuss around women at conferences, I thought that we should all just carry on with what we were doing well already and not get caught up in needless controversy. I even wrote a blog post saying exactly that a couple of years ago. Iâ€™d never experienced (to my knowledge) any difficulties because I was a woman. A bit uncomfortable But then I started hearing more about/was exposed to women who did have bad experiences.
